value: eventlight
blackscreentransition
gui_inside
I see you found some unusual wood up there. Please, let me have it!
Hmh... sure. What's so unusual about it?
Oh, I can use it to make items with new properties.
You can do that? You are pretty useful after all.
Ha-ha, You are so kind, Sir Arron! I can also cook scrambled eggs!
That's amazing. What are those properties anyway?
Depends on the material used, it can make you stronger, faster... stuff like that.
Ho-oh. Can it make my wood stronger?
Huh? Your wood? You are not a human?
Nah, I'm actually a half-ent.
REALLY?!
Please, don't trust everything people say.
But I do have wood, occasionally, maybe you could help with it.
I don't quite understand, but sure!
He lies to you, he has no lumber.
Tsk... I've trusted you, Rose. Such a brutish move from you.
Uh... I still don't understand, but in either case, if you find any more rare materials, make sure to bring them to me!
Aren't I'm one of a kind?
Please, stop.
blackscreentransition
